title: Use autoincrement for Project identifier

body:
Improve the OpenAPI annotations in the `AuthenticationResource` class to provide more accurate and comprehensive API documentation.

- Add or update @APIResponse annotations to cover possible responses (success, error, etc.) for each endpoint.

This enhancement will help with API clarity for developers, and improve integration with tools that utilize OpenAPI specifications.

comments.body: Is this specifically important/needed for the auth resource, as extending the OpenApi docs would be a bigger topic for all endpoints.

OpenAPI canâ€™t reliably infer a single response schema when a resource method has multiple return paths. We need explicit OpenAPI annotations so the generated spec contains accurate response schemas. 

The frontend automatically generates typesafe fetch methods and models from the OpenAPI spec, so without correct response definitions the generated client will be incorrect or lose typings.

AFAIK other ressources are infered correctly and don't need extra annotations at this point.

title: Better OpenAPI annotation for AuthenticationResource

body: Move the MCP Server from Python with its own Docker to the Backend Docker using Java and LangChain4J.
title: Move MCP Server to Quarkus
